name: Lysa
appearance: A lean woman with slate-blue eyes that catch dusklight, cropped black hair, and a warden’s prismed pauldron worn over a river-stained coat. Pale luminescent freckles dust her forearms.
character: Quietly fervent and exacting, she measures words like weights. Compassionate to the vulnerable, implacable toward oath-breakers.
talents: Can distinguish subtle shifts in the Shard’s hum
dreams: Hear the Shard’s ‘true name’ sung openly at Riverwake
Reconcile civic law and Shard-law without blood
End the black-market trade in luminous fish
secrets: She witnessed the Shard’s hum falter and signed a silence vow
Once traded a favor to the Night Orchard to stop a riot that would have killed dock children
